Containers.Name: Custom Tab
Containers.Description: A very simple plugin to allow you to place any webpage (or web app's GUI) onto the tabs of unRaid's GUI
Containers.Changes:
###2018.04.14 - Added in ability to place tabs anywhere on the tab bar.
###2017.12.13 - Added note warning if using HTTPS to access server that all URLs must also use HTTPS
###2017.11.23 - Fixed: Settings icon on unRaid 6.4
###2017.09.23 - Fixed: Change focus to iframe when loaded (IE: Keyboard now works on URL tabs)
###2017.06.24 - Support Adding any unRaid page file as a custom tab
###2017.06.18 - Support custom icons on 6.4 - Azure / Gray themes
###2017.05.14 - Support Multiple Custom Tabs
###2017.05.06 - Initial Release
